name: Rage Golf
description:
Simply click on a place you want to bounce the golf ball and get it in the hole. The game was made for multiple game jams at the same time. The graphics are supposed to look 70's style. ✭ Homepage Feature on GameJolt.com ✭

System Requirements
  • Android 2.3 and up
  • Windows XP and up
  • Mac: Tested on OS X 10.11.6
  • Linux: Tested on Debian 8.7.1
  • Browser with JavaScript enabled
More Details
  • The version for Android uses the Bluetooth permission for wireless gamepads.
Last Update

Version 7.2.2 (June 10, 2017)
